node.statement: Tail vertices connect to Core: (i) Each a_i connects to Core: a_1 is adjacent to 3 via edge {3,a_1}, and the chain a_1-a_2-...-a_n-1 connects all a_i to both 3 and 1 in Core. (ii) Each b_j connects to Core: b_1 is adjacent to 5 via edge {5,b_1}, and the chain b_1-b_2-...-b_k-1 connects all b_j to both 5 and 1 in Core. (iii) Each c_ℓ connects to Core: c_1 is adjacent to 3 via edge {3,c_1}, and the chain c_1-c_2-...-c_m-5 connects all c_ℓ to both 3 and 5 in Core.
